welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Largs, UK! Known for its beautiful coastline and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore our quaint town and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Glasgow International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for overflow flights and serves as a secondary terminal for Glasgow International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Prestwick Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
